all: hi, I am tega. my friend is having a birthday party. everything is set, but the balloons.

lets_play: great, lets play. we need to go to the magic treasure room.

all: this is the magic treasure room. it is filled with magical treasure boxes. in each treasure box, you will find exactly what you are looking for, if you can open it. the lock to each magic box is a puzzle. There is also a puzzle behind the question mark. first we need to choose which box to try to open.

tangram_tutorial: these puzzles are made of pieces of different shapes. we need to find where to put them to fill in the grey area. we have two minutes to try, until the sand in the hourglass runs out, but we need to try even faster so we are in time for the party
